section.name: UNIT 5: COURSE CONCLUSION
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 5: Course Conclusion.

Now that you have completed all of the content units in Engaging Adult Learners in Science, you will have an opportunity to gauge and reinforce what you have learned.

In this culminating activity, you will use various resources to apply the scientific practices to a lesson. After finishing the activity, you will be able to compare your ideas to sample ideas.

Please allow approximately 30 minutes to complete this unit. However, you are free to leave the unit at any time. 

Select the Unit 5 link below to begin the culminating activity for the course.
